title: The Claws of Anarchy
description:
Cats are more than just our lovable pets. They bring comfort when we are down, and endless entertainment when we need it most. Many cultures revere them as magical creatures, who will bring good fortune to those who house and care for them. But if they’re not treated with the respect they deserve, they can quickly go from bringing good fortune to wreaking havoc on your life. 

First, a warning from the bones of the dead
Followed by a haunting childhood memory
Then, a cat seeks revenge 
Finally in our featured story, the last life of nine.

Download Best Fiends FREE today on the Apple App Store or Google Play.
Get Honey for FREE at Join Honey dot com slash SS.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
